resources.string: Choose the number that is higher.\nQuestions can be repeated until you score 20 points.

"Congratulations, you've completed the level!\n Did you know that the number 7 is considered the luckiest number? There are 7 days of the week, 7 continents, 7 colors of the rainbow, 7 musical notes, and much more. 7 is also the most common favorite number for most people in the world."
Choose the Roman numeral that is greater.\nQuestions can be repeated until you score 20 points.
"Congratulations, you've completed the level!\n Did you know that Roman numerals don't have zero?"
Choose the fraction that is larger.\nQuestions can be repeated until you score 20 points.
"Congratulations, you've completed the level!\n In the Middle Ages, operations with fractions were considered the most difficult area of mathematics."
Choose something edible.\Questions can be repeated until you get 20 points.
"Congratulations, you've completed the level!\n Many crocodiles swallow stones. But not because they find them edible. The stones help them dive faster and stay on the bottom."
